sources.title: Hussar Ballad
sources.description:
1812. Poruchik Dmitry Rzhevsky comes to the estate of the retired Major Azarov. He is engaged in absentia to the Majorâ€™s niece, Shurochka, who appears to be an affectation-laden fashionable girl at their first meeting. But he does not know that Shurochka is an excellent rider, swordsman, and can shoot without a miss. Based on Once Upon A Time, a play by Alexander Gladkov. 

Year of production: 1962

Directed by: Eldar Ryazanov
Written by: Eldar Ryazanov, Alexander Gladkov
Music: Tikhon Khrennikov
Director of photography: Leonid Krainenkov
Production designers: Mikhail Bogdanov, Gennady Myasnikov
Starring: Larisa Golubkina, Yury Yakovlev

#FullMoviesWithEngSubs
